name: mm-footer
description: A fully-styled form footer - for use within a form footer or popover component. Capable of displaying variable button set and feedback messages.

attributes.name: message
attributes.description: The feedback message to display, usually feedback for validation success or failure.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: The type of inline message styling to be applied.

attributes.name: fitparent
attributes.description: Instructs the component to fit to its parent container's width (percent or pixel width).

properties.name: message
properties.description: The feedback message to display, usually feedback for validation success or failure.

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of inline message styling to be applied. Valid values are ('error','warning','success' and 'info')

methods.name: showMessage
methods.description: Show the inline feedback message when needed.

methods.name: hideMessage
methods.description: Hide the inline feedback message when needed.
